name: Classic Leather Briefcase
description: A timeless briefcase crafted from full-grain leather, perfect for the modern professional. Features multiple compartments and a padded laptop sleeve.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Apply leather conditioner every 6 months. Avoid prolonged exposure to direct sunlight.

name: Hand-stitched Bifold Wallet
description: A minimalist bifold wallet, hand-stitched for durability. Made from premium vegetable-tanned leather that will develop a beautiful patina over time.
careInstructions: Condition sparingly. The natural oils from your hands will help develop its character.

name: The Journeyman's Duffel Bag
description: Spacious and rugged, this leather duffel bag is your ideal companion for weekend getaways. Features a detachable shoulder strap and solid brass hardware.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Apply leather conditioner every 6 months. Avoid prolonged exposure to direct sunlight.

name: Artisan Leather Belt
description: A sturdy and stylish belt made from a single piece of thick harness leather. The solid buckle is built to last for decades.
careInstructions: Wipe clean with a dry cloth. Condition if it feels dry.

name: Leather Journal Cover
description: Protect your thoughts and sketches with this elegant A5 journal cover. Includes an integrated pen loop and card slots.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Apply leather conditioner every 6 months.

name: Slim Card Holder
description: For the true minimalist, this slim card holder carries your essential cards and a few folded bills without the bulk.
careInstructions: Condition sparingly. The natural oils from your hands will help develop its character.

name: Leather Messenger Bag
description: A versatile messenger bag that blends classic style with modern functionality. Perfect for your daily commute or as a stylish carry-on.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Apply leather conditioner every 6 months.

name: Woven Leather Bracelet
description: A stylish accessory to complete your look. This bracelet is hand-woven from soft, supple leather for a comfortable fit.
careInstructions: Avoid getting wet. Wipe with a dry cloth to clean.

name: Handcrafted Leather Armchair
description: A statement piece for any living room. This armchair is built with a solid wood frame and upholstered in premium, top-grain South African leather. Designed for comfort and built to last generations.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Apply leather conditioner every 6-12 months. Keep away from direct heat sources and sunlight.

name: Leather Keychain
description: A simple yet elegant keychain, crafted from durable leather to keep your keys organized in style.
careInstructions: Wipe clean with a dry cloth.

name: Leather Watch Strap
description: Upgrade your timepiece with a classic leather watch strap that gains character with age.
careInstructions: Avoid getting wet. Condition sparingly.

name: Leather Glasses Case
description: A protective and stylish case for your eyewear, with a soft interior lining.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Keep away from sharp objects.

name: Leather Laptop Sleeve
description: A sleek, padded sleeve to protect your laptop, crafted from premium South African leather.
careInstructions: Wipe clean. Apply leather conditioner occasionally.

name: Leather Desk Mat
description: Elevate your workspace with this large leather desk mat, providing a smooth surface for your mouse and keyboard.
careInstructions: Wipe spills immediately. Clean with a damp cloth.

name: Leather Coasters (Set of 4)
description: A set of four handsome leather coasters to protect your surfaces and add a touch of class.
careInstructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Do not soak.

name: Leather Cushion Cover
description: A luxurious leather cushion cover to add a rustic and sophisticated touch to your living space.
careInstructions: Wipe clean. Apply leather conditioner every 6-12 months.

name: Leather Passport Holder
description: Travel in style with a durable leather passport holder, featuring slots for cards and travel documents.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth.

name: Leather Luggage Tag
description: A sturdy leather luggage tag to help you identify your bags with a touch of elegance.
careInstructions: Wipe clean. Ensure information is secure.

name: Leather Toiletry Bag
description: A spacious and water-resistant leather toiletry bag (Dopp Kit) for all your travel essentials.
careInstructions: Wipe interior and exterior clean. Air dry if wet.

name: The Voyager Backpack
description: A stylish and durable leather backpack with a padded laptop compartment and multiple pockets for organization.
careInstructions: Wipe with a damp cloth. Apply leather conditioner every 6 months.
